pages.title: Difficulty Tiers
pages.text: $(key)Difficulty Tiers$() are optional settings for extra challenge.$(br2)You start at $(key)Normal$(). Each $(key)Bottle of Nightmare$() increases your $(key)Difficulty Tier$() by one.$(br2)Each tier brings different challenges:

$(list)$(key)Hardcore$()$(list2)Base $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility extra difficulty$() increased by $(bold)30$()$(list2)$(mechanic/hostility)Difficulty$() gained from kills is doubled$(list2)$(mechanic/hostility)Hostility damage bonus$() is doubled$(list2)Advanced $(mage/scroll)spell scrolls$() cannot be put into lower-tier $(mage/book)spell books$()$(list2)$(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() from loot has lower thresholds$(list2)Cannot use $(key)Bottle Of Sanity$() or $(key)Hostility Orb$()

$(list)$(key)Nightmare$()$(list2)For every $(bold)1$() $(mage/power)Spell Power$(), gain $(bold)0.5$() $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility extra difficulty$()$(list2)$(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() can be merged$(list2)Can use $(mechanic/curse#nightmare)Nightmare-tier-only items$()$(list2)Also applies all effects from $(mechanic/difficulty_tier#hardcore)Hardcore$()
